sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: use of public money: Amount less than $650.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: use of public money: Amount of $650 or more.

sections.heading: Misappropriation
sections.text: and falsification of accounts by public officer.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for neglect or refusal to pay over.

sections.heading: Compensation
sections.text: of clerk or secretary of commission connected with State Government prohibited.

sections.heading: Private
sections.text: use of state motor vehicle prohibited.
